channel.title: Client Run Error problem thread-4 ( DO NOT WANT TO BE SPOON FED )
channel.description:
ok here is the error im getting i do not want to be told how to fix the problem as i would rather figure it out myself but can someone point me in the right direction where should i specifically be looking like what file name so i can try and fix it. or is this error just due to the client not connecting to where the server is being hosted?
[IMG]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/6120/spoon.jpg[/img]
